<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<admira version="2.2.0" type="variables">
	<properties id="template_variables">
		<param name="sequence_name">Name_of_Sequence</param>
		<param name="material_type">Clips</param>
		<param name="remark">Remarks</param>
		<param name="redaktion_lang"/>
		<param name="sendetitel"/>
		<param name="beitragsname"/>
		<param name="redakteur"/>
		<param name="autor"/>
		<param name="sendedatum"/>
		<param name="projektname_lang"/>
		<param name="lookup_performed">false</param>
		<param name="priority_import">false</param>
		<param name="avid_transfer">false</param>
		<param name="type_of_source">File</param>
		<param name="portal_user_id">dmae</param>
		<param name="portal_user_first_name">Max</param>
		<param name="portal_user_last_name">Mustermann</param>
		<param name="portal_user_roles">filter_types_edit filter_date_edit filter_text_edit filter_job_description_search filter_other_edit filter_id_edit filter_state_edit job_start job_cancel job_delete job_restart job_delete and job_restart job_prio job_comment job_error_clear job_action_bar job_step_view job_parameter job_diagram_view job_gantt_view job_gannt_view essence_info fm_state_edit fm_dates_edit fm_jobid_edit fm_filename_edit fm_delete_file fm_change_expiration fm_disable_expirtation upload_portlet upload_arema_monitor upload_file upload_p2 upload_xdcam upload_priority dashboard_import system_values_edit user_management edi_registry agent_management agent_pause agent_resume agent_stop agent_delete agent_action_bar agent_step_list agent_parameter avidsendto_portlet avidsendto_arema_monitor avidsendto_priority rules_builder statistics_restore_tape statistics_step_waiting_time statistics_number_and_duration system_values_view job_link task_list task_view hsb_recordtodolist dynamicform_portlet job_logviewer</param>
		<param name="ftp_upload_host">159.122.4.146:21</param>
		<param name="ftp_upload_user">dmae</param>
		<param name="ftp_upload_password">pw4Ar3.mA</param>
		<param name="ftp_upload_base_directory">/admira/cache/</param>
		<param name="ftp_upload_session_directory">2016-04-08_20-50-25_608</param>
		<param name="url_hostname">159.122.4.146:8089</param>
		<param name="portal_site">portal_site</param>
	</properties>
	<container>
		<clips>
			<clip sequence="1">
				<videoUri source="C:\DemoFilme\EDahlias.mp4" size= "18862865" >ftp://dmae:pw4Ar3.mA@159.122.4.146:21/admira/cache/EDahlias.mp4</videoUri>
			</clip>
		</clips>
	</container>
</admira>

nodes.name: Konfig
nodes.info:
Um die AWS SDK Libraries in den Classpath aufzunehmen sind folgende Zeilen 
zu etc/arema_profile hinzuzufgen:

for jarfile in $ADMIRA_HOME/S3/S3Test/lib/aws/*.jar
do
    CLASSPATH="$CLASSPATH:$jarfile"
done
for jarfile in $ADMIRA_HOME/S3/S3Test/lib/aws/third-party/*.jar
do
    CLASSPATH="$CLASSPATH:$jarfile"
done

----

Datenbankseitig sind jeweils ein Library, Library_Manager und Pool Record 
anzulegen. Die Statements dazu sehen so aus:

INSERT INTO DMAE.LIBRARY_MANAGERS (MANAGER_ID, LIBRARY_MANAGER_NAME, LIBRARY_MANAGER_TYPE, CONF_FILE_NAME, LIBRARY_MOUNT_POINT, HOST_NAME, USER_NAME, PASSWD, LAST_MODIFIED, CREATION_TIMESTAMP) VALUES (DMAE.LIBRARY_MANAGER_ID.NEXTVAL, 'ECS_S3', 3, 'ibmarema2', 's3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com', 'localhost', 'AKIAJ4CWCOGNIZD5WLRQ', 'L6vjp/1VUWgW2Oji4Ug3IdVy2ElLT2LLqmlxLp96', CURRENT TIMESTAMP, CURRENT TIMESTAMP)

INSERT INTO DMAE.LIBRARIES (LIBRARY_ID, LIBRARY_NAME, LIBRARY_TYPE, TAPE_COUNT, DRIVE_COUNT, LAST_MODIFIED, CREATION_TIMESTAMP) VALUES (DMAE.LIBRARY_ID.NEXTVAL, 'ECS_S3', 's3', 0, 0, CURRENT TIMESTAMP, CURRENT TIMESTAMP)

INSERT INTO DMAE.POOLS (POOL_ID, LIBRARIES_LIBRARY_ID, POOL_NAME, TAPE_COUNT, POOL_TYPE, RULE_PLACEMENT, RULE_ACCESS, SPREAD_TAPE_FRAME, MAX_FREE_SPACE, MIN_FREE_SPACE, TAPE_TYPE, LAST_MODIFIED, CREATION_TIMESTAMP) VALUES (DMAE.POOL_ID.NEXTVAL, (SELECT LIBRARY_ID FROM DMAE.LIBRARIES WHERE LIBRARY_NAME = 'ECS_S3'), 'POOL_ECS_S3', 0, 's3', 'none', 'none', 0, 0, 0, 8, CURRENT TIMESTAMP, CURRENT TIMESTAMP)
--> Hier ist ein Fehler drinnen: Die Library manager ID muss nich beim Pool eingetragen werden. LIBRARY_MANAGERS_MANAGER_ID
---

Der put_to_3 Agent bekommt folgende Parameter:
source_filename: Essence Name
target_pool: 'ECS_S3'
object_name: Target Filename
metadata_xml: Pfad zu optionalem Metadata XML, am besten absoluter Pfad auerhalb Cache (mit Cache File hab ich noch nicht getestet)
org_unit

----

Das Metadata XML sieht wie folgt aus:
?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<metadata>
  <param name="test-key1">test-value1</param>
  <param name="test-key2">test-value2</param>
  <param name="test-key3">test-value3</param>
</metadata>

Bis dann, 
Henning

GIT Konfig
nodes.info:
@


mkdir /home/dmae/git/
cd /home/dmae/git/
git init

vi ~/.netrc

INHALT:
~~~~~
machine github.com
login ibmarema
password tango3t
~~~~~

vi /home/dmae/git/.git/config

INHALT:
~~~~~
[user]
name = "Ulrich Voigt"
email = "uvoigt@de.ibm.com"
[remote "origin"]
        url = https://github.com/ibmarema/flows.git
        fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*
[branch "master"]
        remote = origin
        merge = refs/heads/master
[credential]
        helper = store
~~~~~
		
		
git clone https://github.com/ibmarema/flows.git
